brand_identity.name: Psiholog Mariana Tanase
brand_identity.target_audience: Adults seeking clinical evaluation, therapy, and psychological assessments in Bucharest.

scale.h1: text-5xl md:text-6xl lg:text-7xl font-semibold tracking-tight leading-tight
scale.caption: text-sm tracking-wide uppercase text-muted-foreground

layout_strategies.card_style: bg-white/60 backdrop-blur-sm border border-olive-100 p-8 rounded-2xl hover:shadow-lg hover:border-olive-200 transition-all duration-300
layout_strategies.glass_header: fixed top-0 w-full z-50 bg-beige-100/80 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-olive-100/50

buttons.primary: bg-olive-500 hover:bg-olive-600 text-white rounded-full px-8 py-4 text-lg font-medium transition-all hover:scale-105 shadow-md shadow-olive-500/20
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border-2 border-olive-500 text-olive-600 hover:bg-olive-50 rounded-full px-8 py-4 text-lg font-medium transition-all

cards.service_card: group relative overflow-hidden bg-white rounded-3xl p-8 border border-beige-200 hover:border-olive-300 transition-all duration-500 hover:shadow-xl
cards.price_card: bg-white rounded-2xl p-8 border border-beige-200 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all

images.hero_frame: relative rounded-[2rem] overflow-hidden shadow-2xl shadow-olive-900/10 rotate-1 hover:rotate-0 transition-transform duration-700 ease-out

lifestyle_personal.usage: About Me or Gallery - Humanizing element

visual_enhancers.texture: Use a subtle grain overlay opacity-20 pointer-events-none fixed inset-0 z-[9999] mix-blend-overlay
visual_enhancers.blobs: Use absolute positioned, blurred (blur-3xl) colored blobs (olive-200, brick-100) behind content to create depth
visual_enhancers.dividers: Use organic SVG dividers or generous whitespace (py-32) between sections

hero.headline: Echilibru și claritate pentru mintea ta
hero.subheadline: Psiholog Clinician & Psihoterapeut Mariana Tanase. Servicii acreditate de evaluare psihologică și consiliere în București.

services.title: Psihologie Clinică
services.desc: Evaluare clinică și psihodiagnostic pentru copii și adulți.

services.title: Psihologia Muncii
services.desc: Avize psihologice pentru angajare și control periodic.

services.title: Psihologia Transporturilor
services.desc: Testare psihologică pentru obținerea sau preschimbarea permisului auto.

services.title: Securitate Națională
services.desc: Evaluări pentru permise port-armă și profesii specifice.

technical_instructions.animations: Use framer-motion for smooth scroll reveals. FadeInUp for text, ScaleIn for images.
technical_instructions.calendly: Use react-calendly or iframe for the 'Programări' section.
technical_instructions.responsive: Mobile-first. Ensure images don't overflow on small screens (max-h-[60vh]).

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for dark colors.
Avoid generic centered layouts; use asymmetry.
Ensure all interactive elements have hover states and data-testid.
Font weights: Use Light (300) for large headings and Medium (500) for body text to maintain elegance.
